root.title: Multiple Choice with Multi Media Pop Up
root.scenario:
Dat enim intervalla et relaxat. Duo enim genera quae erant, fecit tria. Sed haec omittamus; Tu quidem reddes.

Open the video button and then answer the question below.
root.question: Primum in nostrane potestate est, quid meminerimus?

item.why: Tu enim ista lenius, hic Stoicorum more nos vexat
Non est ista, inquam, Piso, magna dissensio
Uterque enim summo bono fruitur, id est voluptate
Immo istud quidem, inquam, quo loco quidque, nisi iniquum postulo, arbitratu meo.

item.text: That's correct! Please select Next to continue.
That is still incorrect. Please review the why feedback before selecting Next to continue.
